passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

html > body > div:nth-child(2) > main > div > div > div > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > form:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(7) > div > h5:nth-child(1)
